file_content.text: I should have known they'd send a thief to sneak into this temple.
I should have known they'd send the Republic's most famous soldier to retake the temple.
I should have known they'd send a Jedi to retake the temple.
I should have known the Republic would send its favorite minions to retake the temple.
You may have won the battle for Ilum, but the war is far from over! Even if you defeat the Empire a thousand times, we will always rise again!
You keep rising up, I'm just going to keep smacking you down.
And I'll always oppose you.
Then you must not leave Ilum alive.
I think you're overestimating the Empire. After losing one hundred times in a row, I bet you'll call it quits. Two hundred, tops.
A thousand times? Really?
You have mocked me for the last time!
Whenever the Republic is threatened, the Jedi will be there to defend it.
Then we must remain vigilant.
Perhaps, though you will not be among them.
Your armies are routed, Darth Arho. Throw down your weapons and the Republic will treat you fairly.
Surrender.
I will not be taken prisoner. By the time the Republic Army arrives, I will be safely off this frozen world.
But first, I'm going to rid the galaxy of you!
Sorry--the Empire's going to have to rise up without you next time.
But you won't see it! [Attack]
Your deaths will be an inspiration to all who serve the Empire!
Your death will be an inspiration to all who serve the Empire!
